data.title: Media in Charlotte, North Carolina
data.text:
Overview of mass media in Charlotte, North Carolina, United States

Charlotte, North Carolina is a U.S. city that serves as a hub for numerous media sources.

The Charlotte television market is the 21st largest TV market in the United States, and the largest in North Carolina, according to Nielsen Media Research. [1] Charlotte is the Largest Market In The United States Where The Big 6 is not Owned & Operated.

Network owned-and-operated stations are highlighted in bold.

The Charlotte radio market is the 24th largest in the U.S., according to Arbitron. Broadcast radio stations serving the market include, in order of format:
